name: Word Puzzle: Jigsaw
description:
The Unique Jigsaw Crossword Puzzle Game!

Boost your brain power & keep your mind sharp.

All words are hidden in the squares, carefully found and connect them.
It starts off as an easy word game and becomes challenging!
You will have fun improving your vocabulary and spelling skills.
Your brain will thank you for the workout!

HOW TO PLAY?
. Horizontal and Vertical letters will form a word
. Drag the blocks to fit them

TONS OF UNIQUE LEVELS
. Over 800 puzzles are unique and full of fun and amazing challenges!

Notes
. Easy to play game for all ages.
. You can play offline in anytime.
. Enjoy the game with various devices. (Phones and Tablets)
. This game contains the ads like banner, interstitial, and reward video ads.

E-MAIL
